title: Thoughts? help pls
body:
Hi there, im leo and i have been playing ranked alot over the current season acheiving diamond tier throughout..
I am currently D5 1LP, im gaining 8lp and losing 28 making it near impossible to climb, is there anything i can do about this
if i hit 0 im going to be demoted as im vsing p4/5's and im unsure as the whether i should sit and wait for decay before i play again or do i keep playing
please leave your thoughts. My only goal is to maintain d5 and not necessarily climb
